hero_naslov: Kinematically Trapped Force as an Energy Source
hero_opis: A mechanical assembly that, once tightened, spontaneously begins to accelerate - without external input. This is not an illusion, but a consequence of ingeniously designed geometry and a kinematic trap. This discovery does not disprove Newton's laws; on the contrary, it confirms their validity in new mechanical systems. Welcome to a world where the tension force of the chain becomes kinematically trapped. The necessary balance of torques is achieved by constant angular acceleration - as the only possible physical response.
